Text: Re Deferral Enrollment provide me with my ID and password to make my election Thanks Dick Westfahl Executive NRON Sent by Enron NRON PM To Eligible Employees cc Subject Deferral Enrollment Good news Deferral program enrollment begins Wednesday November Enrons Bonus Stock Option and Bonus Phantom Stock Programs provide you wi th an opportunity to receive stock options and phantom stock in lieu of all or a portion of the cash bonus you may receive during To make enrollment even more convenient for you this years deferral program information is available on eHRonline To learn more about your deferral program opportunities and to enroll for deferrals access eHRonline at Call the ISC Help Desk at if you need your ID or password to access the system Review the program descriptions attached to the Election Form before y ou make your elections If you decide to defer compensation complete the Election Form before Friday December the enrollment deadline Print your Election Form and Confirmation Statement right from the web site and youre finished Sound easy It is DEFERRAL ENROLLMENT ADDED VALUE FOR YOUR FUTURE
